text: Motion
Motion
Motion

Um...
For today's lesson──

Koito.
You've been taking notes properly till the end.

......!
P-Producer-san...!

Haha, finished writing?
Even for today's portion?
Y-Yes...!

Alright, then show me.
Summarize everything you've written so far.

Ah... Yes.
P-Please take a look...!

You've been writing diligently every day.
With this much, it means Koito has achieved results.
I-Is that so...?

.........
It would be nice if that were the case...

I've told you, haven't I? If there's something
new you can do or something you've learned,

That's something to be happy about.
I'm also very happy.
...Producer-san too?

Yeah, of course!
For this much, if Koito gains something,

I truly believe it was worth it
to come to the training camp.
...Producer-san...

T-That's right...
I'm also glad I came to the training camp...!

T-Thank you... and
please continue to take care of me, Producer-san.
